job.title: Full-stack team for AI-based project. Long-term
job.description:
! Without attaching a presantation about your agency in PDF file (certificates, client testimonials, case study), your application will not be considered. (bot check). We're interested in long-time relationship and want to have an overview of your agency.

We're seeking a skilled team of 5-10 full-stack developers for a long-term partnership to imrove and refresh our AI-based EdTech platform.

If your team is up for the challenge, please submit a proposal including:
 
- Briefly introduce your team's relevant skills and experience.

 - Attach your team's resumes highlighting key achievements and skills.

- Case Studies: Share project portfolios demonstrating success in AI or EdTech projects. (or complex platforms)

- Our tech stack: С#/.NET,  JavaScript, React/Node.js, Next.js

note: For ease of reviewing applications, please attach your team's resume in the attached files 
 
Thank you!
Alex

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are looking for a talented and experienced full-stack team to join our AI-based project on a long-term basis. The project duration is expected to be more than 6 months. 

The ideal candidate should have a strong background in .NET Framework, Node.js, AI Model Integration, JavaScript, and React. 

Your main responsibilities will include developing and implementing AI models, integrating them into our existing system, and ensuring seamless functionality across all platforms. 

To apply for this position, please submit a proposal detailing how you can contribute to the project. Please include relevant experience, skills, and examples of past completed projects. We also encourage you to provide links to any relevant portfolios or repositories that showcase your work. 

We look forward to reviewing your proposal and discussing this exciting opportunity further.
